thread.title: Gerry Kiddy
thread.title_full: Harvey Norman Ireland reviewed by Gerry Kiddy

author: Gerry Kiddy
title: Gerry Kiddy
text: I had a Panasonic ALL 8 Streaming Speaker that decided to stop working. Contacting Panasonic gave me details of the repair centre in Dublin. It turned out to be in Northern Ireland (Craigavon Radio Centre). Harvey Normak took charge and returned the goods, had them repaired and calleed me when they were back. First class service.
